text: "You're the Best Thing" is a 1984 song by The Style Council and is the second single from their debut studio album Café Bleu. It went to number 5 in the United Kingdom and Ireland, number 76 in the United States, number 17 in Australia and number 7 in New Zealand. ==Track listings== ; 7-inch single (UK) # "You're The Best Thing" — 4:18 # "The Big Boss Groove" — 3:40 ; 12-inch single (UK) # "You're The Best Thing" (Long Version) — 5:41 # "You're The Dub Thing" — 4:58 # "The Big Boss Groove" — 4:39 ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Soul ballads Category:Blue-eyed soul songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:The Style Council songs
